data.news_body:

Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, ('Listing regulations') the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e., May 25, 2023 have considered and approved the following:
1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.
2. Recommended a final dividend of Rs 1.75/- per Equity Share having Face Value of Rs. 10/- each for the Financial Year 2022-2023.
and Other items as mentioned in attachment.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e., February 07, 2023 have inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:
1. Considered and approved the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022
2. Declared interim dividend of Rs 1.25/-(Rupees One and Paisa Twenty Five Only) per Equity Share having Face Value of Rs. 10/- (Rupees Ten Only) each (i.e. 12.5%) for the Financial Year 2022-2023.
3. Approved a capex plan of Rs. 22.5 Cr for setting up of manufacturing facility for bakery products.
4. Appointed of B K Gupta & Associates as a Secretarial Auditors of the Company

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2022 along with the unmodified Auditor''s Report.

Recommended a final dividend of Rs 1.25/- per Equity Share having Face Value of Rs. 10/- each (i.e. 12.5%) for the F.Y. 2021-2022

Re-appointment of Mr. Alok Kumar Misra, (DIN: 00163959) and Mrs. Pooja Luthra, (DIN: 03413062) as Non- Executive Independent Directors of the Company.

Appointed Mr. Manu Talwar as Chief Executive Officer of the Company w.e.f. 02.05.2022.

Appointed JPM & Associates LLP, Ludhiana, as the Secretarial Auditors and M/s Grant Thornton India LLP, Gurgaon as the Internal Auditors of the Company for the F.Y. 2022-23.

Approved the Investment and giving loan to WOS of Mrs. Bectors Food Specialities Limited.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, ('Listing regulations') we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e., March 7, 2021 have inter-alia, considered and approved the following:

data.caption: Financial Results And Dividend
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, ('Listing regulations') we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e., March 7, 2021 have inter-alia, considered and approved the following:

1. Audited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2021 along with the unmodified Auditor''s Report issued by M/s BSR & Co. LLP, Statutory Auditors of the Company;

2. Audited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2021 along with the unmodified Auditor''s Report issued by M/s BSR & Co. LLP, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

3. Recommended a final dividend of Rs 2.40/-(Rupees Two and Forty Paisa Only) per Equity Share having Face Value of Rs. 10/- (Rupees Ten Only) each (i.e. 24%) for the Financial Year 2020-2021.
